meanings.definition: To give (money or goods) for a charitable purpose.
meanings.sent1: She donates clothes to the shelter every month.
meanings.sent2: He donates money to help sick children.
meanings.sent3: The generous donor donates toys to the orphanage.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness donates hope to those in need.
meanings.sent5: Their act of donating warms many hearts.

meanings.definition: To contribute or give something, especially to a cause or organization.
meanings.sent1: The community donates food for the food drive.
meanings.sent2: They donate their time to clean up the park.
meanings.sent3: The company donates laptops to support education.
meanings.sent4: His effort donates positivity to the team.
meanings.sent5: Their teamwork donates success to the project.
